snippet: Shasta Averyhardt, 26, and Ginger Howard, 18, had mixed results as they competed last week for L.P.G.A. Tour cards.
abstract: Profiles of Shasta Averyhardt and Ginger Howard, among the few black women in professional golf who hope to inspire future generations of minority women.
lead_paragraph: Shasta Averyhardt, 26, and Ginger Howard, 18, had mixed results as they competed last week for L.P.G.A. Tour cards.

headline.seo: Averyhardt and Howard Hope to Inspire Other Black Women
headline.main: Seeking to Qualify but Also to Inspire
headline.print_headline:
Attempting to Qualify
And Seeking to Inspire
